name: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
description: Turn your fave hot dip appy into a satisfying, protein-packed meal while still holding onto all its cozy comfort. Serve this dish with rice or mashed potatoes to soak up all that creamy sauce.

ingredients.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix or CCB Dip Mix

preparation:
1. Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook until golden and cooked through, about 5–6 min per side.  
  2. Reduce heat to medium. Add veggies, 1⁄2 cup cheddar, cream cheese, sour cream, and dip mix. Stir to combine (it’s OK if the cream cheese is not fully incorporated yet). Cover; cook 4 min, stirring frequently, or until cheese has melted.  
  3. Top with remaining 1⁄2 cup cheese. Cover; cook 1 min or until cheese has melted. 
  4. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: Chicken breast fillets are ready to flip when they release easily from the pan—they should have a golden-brown sear.
